content:
Sure, here are some examples of cities that have repeatedly hosted the World Athletics Championships in the past:

1) Helsinki, Finland: Helsinki has hosted the World Athletics Championships twice, in 1983 and 2005, and is slated to host it again in 2022.

2) London, United Kingdom: London hosted the World Athletics Championships in 2017, and it was the first city to have hosted the event three times (previously in 1983 and 2005).

3) Tokyo, Japan: Tokyo has hosted the World Athletics Championships twice, in 1991 and 2019, and will host again in 2022.

4) Göteborg, Sweden: Göteborg hosted the World Athletics Championships twice, in 1995 and 2006.

5) Stuttgart, Germany: Stuttgart hosted the World Athletics Championships twice, in 1993 and 2009.

6) Rome, Italy: Rome has hosted the World Athletics Championships twice, in 1987 and 1983.

These are just a few examples of cities that have repeatedly hosted the World Athletics Championships, and there are other cities that have hosted the event more than once as well.
